column4: guys! the rescue CD ias asking me about a device to use as root file system and giving me choices of /dev/sdaX  - what are these sda things ?
those are your partitions
a = first drive X = partition number
Please dont swear even if you try to discuize it
sure. soryr

Create ISO of CD Rom... dd if=/dev/cdrom of=/home/YourUserName/Desktop/file.iso bs=2k
